original_title: 2019 IU Tour Concert: Love, Poem in Seoul
overview: “We must love each other even more at times like this.” On November 24, 2019, at her last leg of the 2019 Love, Poem tour concert in Korea, IU left a heart-warming message behind as she wrapped up the final stage.
title: 2019 IU Tour Concert: Love, Poem in Seoul
